Algorithm.name: GroupAdder
Algorithm.Comment: Type a javadoc-style comment describing the algorithm class. Apply a mask to a group to obtain a list of time series. Retrieve all of the input values and add them together The MISSING value determines how values are fetched if they are not all present at the triggered time slice. Can be triggered by all (masked) TSID values in the group or can be run on a timer. The 'sum' output must be defined. count and average are optional. These will be the number of values summed and the average.
